Name: Mediocre
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Ripe pineapple, rich vanilla and honey laced with rum. The use of mead in this drink inspired the 'Mediocre' name. Best made with a light white rum infused with a vanilla pod, rather than a commercially produced vanilla-flavoured rum.
History: Created in 2016 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Mediocre contains 184 calories
